task_id.description: Unique identifier for the task plan (e.g., UUID)

name.description: A short, descriptive name for the task plan.

description.description: A detailed description of the task plan's purpose and goals.

goal.description: The overall objective of the task plan.

status.description: The current status of the task plan (e.g., 'pending', 'in_progress', 'completed', 'failed').

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the task plan was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the task plan was last updated.

items.description: Array of subtask IDs associated with this task plan.

metadata.description: Additional metadata associated with the task plan. Can store arbitrary key-value pairs.
